mapper.select:
SELECT s.subjecttitle AS subjecttitle, s.subjectid AS subjectid, u.username AS user_userid, s.imgsrc AS imgsrc, s.category as category, u.profileimg FROM subject s JOIN user u ON s.user_userid = u.userid
where 1=1
where s.category = "1"
where s.category = "2"
where s.category = "3"
AND (s.subjecttitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or s.subjectcontent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%'))
and s.subjecttitle like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and u.username like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and s.subjectcontent like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
limit #{onePageRecord} offset #{offsetPoint}

SELECT sa.applyid as applyid, sa.applyimg as applyimg, sa.applycontent as applycontent, s.subjecttitle as subjecttitle, s.category as category, u.username as user_userid, u.profileimg as profileimg FROM subjectapply sa LEFT JOIN subject s ON s.subjectid = sa.subject_subjectid LEFT JOIN user u ON u.userid = sa.user_userid WHERE sa.isteam = 1
AND 1=1
AND s.category = '1'
AND s.category = '2'
AND s.category = '3'
AND (s.subjecttitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR sa.applycontent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%'))
AND s.subjecttitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND sa.applycontent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
LIMIT #{onePageRecord} OFFSET #{offsetPoint}
